sentence: "We are watching the Wisconsin senate race closely and are always thrilled to see strong women leaders like Sarah Godlewski consider running in these critical seats," said Ben Ray, spokesman for Emily's List, a national group with a significant fundraising apparatus to elect Democratic women candidates.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Marquette poll shows Rebecca Kleefisch and Mandela Barnes leading key primary contests

sentence: Mandela Barnes' new internal from Impact Research (formerly known as Anzalone Liszt Grove or ALG) gives him a 38-17 lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry in the August Democratic primary, with state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson at 9% and 8%, respectively.
title: Morning Digest: Tennessee GOP's bill would block Trump's pick, but they'll need courts to agree
